3.title: REDUCED SHAKESPEARE COMPANY
clues: "As the sea, my love is deep.""Ditto!"[Smooch]"You shall be with him hence!""Ditto!""No--ooh!  Ugh!""Yaah!""I die!""Ditto!"[Kkk!]
"Boo-oo!""Bl-bl-bl-bl!  Mad!  Ow!""Poison!""Mother!  Treachery!""Agh-hh-hh-hh!""Ugh!"
"How I do thrive in this lady's love, and she in mine!""Ps-ps-ps-ps!""Thou dost stone my heart!""Mmgh-mm-mm!""Ps-ps-ps-ps!""D'oh!  'Tis happiness to die.  Oo-algh!"
"The king never shall sun that morrow see.""Nay!"[smack!]"Aye!""The smell of blood!  Woo-woo-woo-woo-woo-woo!""I will not yield, to kiss the ground!  Nyuh-uh-uh.""Tragic."
"I will fight at sea!""I'll help you!""Huh?  Oh, kill me.""Augh.""Aah!  I can no more!  Ow!""I have immortal longings!  Ow.  Ow!  Aughh."
